items.content_html: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.

Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.

items.content_html: Solar Probe is a lightweight web dashboard for monitoring solar activity in near real time. It integrates data from NOAA and NASA, including X-ray flux, solar proton levels, and sunspot metrics.

items.content_html: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: Cipher is a modern, animated web experience built using React.js, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and GSAP. The project showcases smooth transitions, responsive design, and performance optimization through Vite and custom animations with GSAP and Lenis Scroll. Developed with a focus on clean UI/UX and lightweight delivery across all devices.

The project showcases smooth transitions, responsive design, and performance optimization through Vite and custom animations with GSAP and Lenis Scroll. Developed with a focus on clean UI/UX and lightweight delivery across all devices.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer â€” A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
